name: Resurgence (itch) (Uphendra, Ibrahim)
description:
This is a puzzle solving game which is made from the theme Courage.

You are a space marine and you have to make a space station run again by placing plasma balls into the space station's core. you have to conserve the amount of plasma cores you have to reach the goal. The plasma ball will start freezing once the game has started have a look into the bar in the UI. Have courage to make the space station running again by using the plasma balls

Controls :

WASD to move the player

place the plasma ball at the center of the core
